After her long hiatus, Katy Perry is hitting the award show circuit with her new single, and has been giving some odd red carpet interviews along the way. Close Katy Perry walks out on BRITs interview UP NEXT VIDEO Katy Perry walks out on BRITs interview. Source: Facebook/BRIT Awards Katy Perry walks out on BRITs interview 
After admitting to “mental health” issues and throwing shade at Britney Spears during a Grammys chat, Katy’s outdone herself at the BRIT Awards! Katy's been acting kooky in recent interviews! Source: Getty 
The star, 32, seemed to have no filter as she spoke to George Shelley and Lilah Parsons on the ruby rug. 
When they asked if she was nervous to perform, she brushed it off, saying “I take pills for that stuff, hello!” Katy joked about "taking pills" to combat her stage fright. Source: Facebook 
The confession comes after live audio from her Grammys performance was leaked online, featuring the singer sounding shaky, pitchy and out of breath. 
She recently revealed to BBC One’s Nick Grimshaw that TV performances are her “Achilles heel”, telling the radio host that it’s “hard to perform sometimes”. 
The singer explained: “I see my peers who I admire sitting in the audience, and I'm like 'I'll never be Beyonce, I'm just less than Beyonce.” After live audio leaked from her Grammys performance, Katy admitted it was "hard". Source: Getty 
On the BRITs red carpet, she got real about her new album, revealing that she wrote over 40 songs for the record and “not all of them are great”, as the two interviews laughed nervously. She said not all the songs from her new album are great. Source: Facebook 
She then said she couldn’t wait to see Ed Sheeran perform, and when George pointed out that he was being interviewed next, she pretended to be miffed at being rushed away, saying: “Fine, I’ll leave then”. The "Roar" singer was seen growling for the cameras. Source: Facebook 
They managed to convince her to stay for a few more questions, but when they did try to wrap up the interview she joked: “You’re gonna let me go? No, I’m firing YOU!” The singer tells the interviewers that they're "fired". Source: Facebook 
Clearly enjoying playing the dramatic diva, Katy then handed her mic over before storming off theatrically. Katy abruptly ends the chat by walking off! Source: Facebook 
The gobsmacked red carpet hosts didn’t really have much to say afterwards, other than to call Katy “a bundle of life”! Are Orlando and Katy on the rocks? Source: Getty 
The bizarre interviews come as rumours swirl around her relationship with actor Orlando Bloom, who she hasn’t been seen with publicly for over a month. 
RELATED: Katy denies pregnancy 
The 40-year-old was a no-show at both the Grammys and the BRITs, despite confirming to X17 's photographers: "I'm going to be with Katy at the Grammys." 
His absence has led to speculation that the fun-loving pair have hit the rocks. Say it ain’t so, guys!
